samples.context: Scalp itch is a fungal infection of the scalp and hair. It usually occurs in young children, but may appear in all age groups.
samples.question: What age group is primarily affected by scalp itch?

samples.context: It is contagious and may be spread from child to child in a school or day care setting.
samples.question: How is scalp itch commonly spread?

samples.context: An antifungal drug called griseofulvin cures scalp itch in one to three months.
samples.question: What medication is used to treat scalp itch?

samples.context: It usually occurs in young children, but may appear in all age groups. An antifungal drug called griseofulvin cures scalp itch.
